metadata.title: CVE-2020-15890 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
LuaJit through 2.1.0-beta3 has an out-of-bounds read because __gc handlerframe traversal is mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libluajit-5.1-2 - 2.1.0~beta3+git20220320+dfsg-4.1
libluajit-5.1-common - 2.1.0~beta3+git20220320+dfsg-4.1
luajit - 2.1.0~beta3+git20220320+dfsg-4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: luajit package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0~beta3+git20220320+dfsg-4.1').
